fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars

Class VariableDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.StaticVariableDescriptor
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.VariableDescriptor

  • public class VariableDescriptor
extends StaticVariableDescriptor
    The class VariableDescriptor extends the class StaticVariableDescriptor with dynamic information about variables: the owner model and the Java field that defines the variable in the owner model.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant     owner != null
 invariant     f != null
 invariant     name.equals(f.getName())
 invariant       Value.class.isAssignableFrom(cvd.f.getType())
 invariant       f.getDeclaringClass().isAssignableFrom(owner.getClass())
 invariant       let beginIndex = f.getGenericType().getTypeName().indexOf("<") + 1 and endIndex = f.getGenericType().getTypeName().indexOf(">") in f.getGenericType().getTypeName().substring(beginIndex, endIndex).equals(type.getCanonicalName())

    Created on : 2018-07-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • VariableDescriptor

        public VariableDescriptor(AtomicHIOA owner,

        create a complete variable descriptor.

        Contract

         pre     owner != null
 pre     AtomicHIOA.class.isAssignableFrom(owner.getClass())
 pre     f != null
 pre     f.getDeclaringClass().isAssignableFrom(owner.getClass())
 pre     AtomicHIOA.class.isAssignableFrom(f.getDeclaringClass())
 pre     Value.class.isAssignableFrom(f.getType())
 pre     let beginIndex = f.getGenericType().getTypeName().indexOf("<") + 1 and endIndex = f.getGenericType().getTypeName().indexOf(">") in f.getGenericType().getTypeName().substring(beginIndex, endIndex).equals(type.getCanonicalName())
 post    owner.equals(this.getOwner())
 post    f.equals(this.getField)
        Parameters:
        owner - model that owns this variable.
        f - field declared to represent the variable.
        type - actual type of the model variable.
        visibility - visibility of the variable (imported, exported, internal).
